Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Considering its intrinsic worth, I kindly propose an offer of $15,000 for this item. This price reflects not only the product's value but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you decide to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. If you need any further information or have questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
